projects.title: My Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Lane and Object detection in Automated cars
projects.bodyText:
- The project's objective was to design a model car that could detect the lanes and objects in front of it without human intervention. 
 - The model was built and connected to Raspberry Pi and Arduino, which acted as the master and the slave devices. 
- The Arduino was programmed to move the wheels of the model.
 - The images captured from the camera mounted on the model were provided as input to the Raspberry Pi. 
- They were subjected to pre-processing, canny edge detection to detect the curves and edges, hough transform to accurately mark the lines, and linear regression to detect the lanes and blur out the surroundings. 
 - The model had an accuracy greater than 90%.

projects.title: Benefit - the Fitness App
projects.bodyText:
- An android app which allows the user to track both mental and physical wellness by displaying the overall calorie intake, the exercises completed and tracking the meditation hours of an individual.
 - The dashboard page provides the user with a pie chart of the number of workouts completed and daily calorie intake. 
 - The user details, such as BMI, will be shown on the personal details page.
 - The application also has a meditation tab that can play music where the user can set the timer for the meditation. 
 - The user can also view the exercise and instructions on how to complete it appropriately. 
 - The SQLite database was used to store the individual personal details, food intake, and progress.

projects.title: Routine Tracker for Students and Teachers
projects.bodyText:
- The website was designed for students and teachers to track their daily routines for class. 
 - They could view the class schedules, add notes, attach essential links, and maintain a to-do list within the website.
 - The Professors could mark the attendance of the enrolled candidates.
 - The candidates can also track the attendance for each class which is displayed by the attendance percentage of classes attended to the total number of classes conducted.

projects.title: Library manager
projects.bodyText:
- An application that allows the library to track the borrowing/selling of books. 
 - The website has two modules: the admin and the customer module.
 - Depending on availability, the customer could buy or borrow the books, view the cart, and checkout after viewing the final price.
 - If the customer borrowed the book, they would receive mail before the last return date as a reminder.
 - The library admin could add, delete, or restock books, view the library members, and view the books borrowed with the return date.

projects.title: E-care for Public
projects.bodyText:
- The project's main objective was to improve the patients' interaction with hospitals and to efficiently manage the data. 
 - This application would allow patients to connect to hospitals, book beds, get appointments with the doctor, and view their medical history.
 - The doctors could view the patients assigned for a particular day and provide diagnosis and prescriptions.
 - The patient's details were stored in a separate file, and each time the patient visited, the patient's details were appended to the same file.
 - The patient was also sent an email as a reminder for the appointment. 
 - The files of the patient are stored in the system's memory.
tags: Reading from and writing to files

projects.title: Encryption and Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- The project aims to secure the data and message transfer from person to person using an encryption algorithm.
 This project allows the user to enter a message which will be encrypted and stored.
 - The authorized person would be able to read the received message in its original format after logging in and providing the password to decrypt the message. 
 - Encryption and decryption are carried out with the help of the caesar cipher algorithm.
